TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapUtility extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ISoapUtility
Public NotInheritable Class SoapUtility Implements ISoapUtility

summary.span: Proporciona utilidades que admiten que el servidor exporte servidores proxy de aplicación COM+ con SOAP habilitado y el cliente los importe.

span.span: Provides utilities to support the exporting of COM+ SOAP-enabled application proxies by the server and the importing of the proxies by the client.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Funciones de la utilidad proporciona se llaman desde varias ubicaciones dentro de COM +; sin embargo, su objetivo principal es admitir la exportación e importación de servidores proxy de cliente.The utility functions that provides are called from numerous locations within COM+; however, their primary purpose is to support the export and import of client proxies. se utiliza internamente por .NET Framework. is used internally by the .NET Framework. No es necesario utilizar directamente en el código.You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetServerBinPath (string rootWebServer, string inBaseUrl, string inVirtualRoot, out string binPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetServerBinPath(string rootWebServer, string inBaseUrl, string inVirtualRoot, [out] string& binPath) cil managed
Public Sub GetServerBinPath (rootWebServer As String, inBaseUrl As String, inVirtualRoot As String, ByRef binPath As String)
public: virtual void GetServerBinPath(System::String ^ rootWebServer, System::String ^ inBaseUrl, System::String ^ inVirtualRoot, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % binPath);

span.span: The root Web server.
The base URL address.
The name of the virtual root.

param.name: binPath
param.span: El parámetro que devuelve este método contiene la ruta de acceso de archivo del directorio bin de la raíz virtual SOAP.

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the file path for the SOAP virtual root bin directory.

summary.span: Devuelve la ruta de acceso del directorio bin de SOAP.

span.span: Returns the path for the SOAP bin directory.

exception.span: Un llamador de la cadena de llamadas no tiene permiso para obtener acceso al código no administrado.

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: La utilidad SOAP no está disponible.

span.span: The SOAP utility is not available.

exception.span: La llamada para obtener el directorio de sistema no se ha realizado correctamente.

span.span: The call to get the system directory failed.
